page.title: 17YOUNG PEOPLES GROUPS
page.content: The{Frampton Playgroup}meets in the village hall on Tues. and Thurs. mornings, 09.15-11.45. 24 youngsters are looked after by 3 leaders and a girl from the Youth Training Scheme. The children enjoy a wide range of activities and if fine they spend time in the Old Primary School playground. The summer outing was to Phoenix Park, Cowbit. It is hoped to start a Mother and Toddler Group. {Frampton Brownie Pack} also meet in the village hall. There are 15 members but numbers are rising. For a tea making challenge the Brownies went round the village selling cups of tea, accompanied by a brown and yellow teapot large enough to hold 4 Brownies and milk jug and sugar bowl to match. Â£40 was raised which will provide a years food for a child in Africa.
